functions.name: PY
functions.description: Runs Python code locally with scalar data and output.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Python code that assigns scalar output to a variable named 'pyout'.

parameters.name: data1
parameters.description: Scalar data available as a global variable.

functions.name: PY.ARR
functions.description: Runs Python code locally with array data and output.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Python code that assigns array output to a variable named 'pyout'.

parameters.name: data1
parameters.description: Array data available as a global variable.

functions.name: PY.BETA
functions.description: Runs Python with array input and output.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Python code text or URL to file.

parameters.name: data1
parameters.description: Array available as a global variable.

functions.name: JL
functions.description: Gets code or data from Jupyterlite.
